architectural_resources: (Likely) external database for SonarQube (PostgreSQL suggested by README and sonar.properties comments)
TLS/CA certificate distribution (custom CA certs imported into JVM truststore)
CI/CD pipeline using GitHub Actions deploying via SSH and running Terraform remotely
Terraform state backend on S3-compatible object storage (MinIO) (from workflow BackendConfig)
Remote build/deploy host accessed over SSH (from workflow secrets)
